backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, role‑based access control, and full CRUD operations for property listings with admin‑only mutation methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping navigation and admin-status features to affected frontend files and components with test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated frontend file summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major React components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme configuration defining a warm neutral OKLCH color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, and bootstrapping the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for Home, Properties, Inquiries, and Admin within the SiteLayout root.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Admin UI for granting and revoking admin access via principal IDs with validation, alerts, and mutation handlers.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: Displays instructions for gaining admin access and shows the user's principal with copy support when they are not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/HomepageAut: Renders a login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with reactive authentication state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Shows the authenticated user's principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: Displays business address and phone information with icons using data from siteData.ts.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Homepage hero section with branding, contact options, an auth button, and a featured image.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: Inquiry submission form with validation and simulated success handling but no backend submission.
Displays a list of inquiries with contact details and message content, or a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Provides quick-access buttons for calling, maps, and social links with compact and default layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing business info, contact details, hours, and a credits section.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, branding, and compact contact bar, showing an admin link when authorized.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines a page layout with header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/properties/Inlin: Provides an inline form for creating or editing properties with support for image uploads and YouTube or file-based video input.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Displays a property with images, video, and admin edit/delete actions, switching to an inline editor when editing.
Modal form for adding or editing a property, supporting text fields and image uploads.
Image carousel with navigation and error handling for property images.
Renders a grid of property cards or a placeholder message when no properties exist.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Defines the Property interface, business info, social links, and seed property data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend admin diagnostics including caller principal and admin status using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides mutations to grant or revoke admin roles with error normalization and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoPlayba: Loads a video blob's direct URL for playback and manages loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Handles client-side video upload by converting files to blobs and tracking upload progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Returns an empty inquiries list placeholder since backend support was removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity loading via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Syncs a state value with localStorage and updates storage on state changes.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Provides queries and mutations for listing, creating, updating, and deleting property records.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Checks whether the caller is an admin using available backend methods with fallback logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page handling authentication, admin checks, diagnostics, and displaying inquiries with refresh controls.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, features overview, and an inquiry contact section.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Page showing a simple inquiry form with supporting text and title setup.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Property listings page supporting admin-only CRUD operations with authentication checks and error handling.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Guide explaining how to migrate site content, properties, and images to Google Sites using data from siteData.ts and localStorage.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines basic frontend-only types for user profiles and inquiries.
frontend/src/types/propertyVideo.ts: Utility types and logic for determining property video type such as YouTube or uploaded blobs.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts image files to data URLs with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/icError.ts: Normalizes IC canister errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/src/utils/videoFileToDataUrl.ts: Converts video files to data URLs without size restrictions for chunked upload workflows.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Parses YouTube URLs, extracts video IDs, validates URLs, and generates embed URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state JSON describing admin-role feature requirements, issues, and pending requests for showing an Admin navbar button only to admin users.
